carecompare 0.0.1

Import a dataset from the Provider Data Catalog

read_cms.Rd

Imports a specified dataset from the CMS Provider Data Catalog using readr::read_csv.

read_cms(
  datasetid = NULL,
  downloadurl = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

datasetid

A dataset identifier. Used only if the download URL is not specified.

downloadurl

The direct URL to the dataset of interest.

...

Additional arguments passed to readr::read_csv.

Value

A tibble::tibble

Author

Alex Zajichek

Examples

read_cms(
  datasetid = "qqw3-t4ie"
)
#> Rows: 19 Columns: 10
